venue.address_1: 100 Arthur F Brady Drive, Suite A
venue.name: Eastern Mountain Sports

item.description: EMS hosts a Club Day and if you are a member of an outdoor club (which you are by being a member of this!) you get a 20-25% off that day. Our group has been invited to attend the store to promote the group, only 8 groups get invited! I will be attending most of the two days at a table. I'm looking for any volunteers that would like to help out at the table? Looking for help Fri 13th from 4-8pm and Sat. 14th 10am -12pm. If you can't help at the table, but are looking for some new gear, drop in and get your discount!
item.name: Club Day at Eastern Mountain Sports
